member.name: D3D12_RANGE_UINT64
member.summary: Describes a memory range in a 64-bit address space.

member.name: D3D12_RANGE_UINT64.Begin
member.summary: The offset, in bytes, denoting the beginning of a memory range.

member.name: D3D12_RANGE_UINT64.End
member.summary: The offset, in bytes, denoting the end of a memory range.End is one-past-the-end.
